column4: I am crazy about NETBOOK remix :D i wanna install it but i Cant download win32-image-writer, the page is not available. any alternative ?
I am crazy about NETBOOK remix :D i wanna install it but i Cant download win32-image-writer, the page is not available. any alternative ?
use a linux box to put the UNR image on a USB stick .. dd if=/path/to/the/image/file.img of=/path/to/partition1/of/usbstick bs=1024
then boot from USB and away you go
i am on a linux box now, please give me the complete command :)
